text: Persian Gulf is a mediterranean sea in Western Asia. Persian Gulf may also refer to: *, a warship *Persian Gulf University, Bushehr Province, Iran *Persian Gulf (missile), an Iranian anti-ship munition *Persian Gulf (horse) (1940–1964), a British thoroughbred racehorse ==See also== * *Persian Gulf naming dispute *Gulf War (1990–1991), a war waged by a U.S.-led coalition against Iraq
title: Persian Gulf (disambiguation)
